statements: DELETE FROM robot_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM robot_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND sensor_value < 50;
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Engineer WHERE role = 'Maintenance Engineer' AND experience < 3;
DELETE FROM Sensor WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor';
DELETE FROM DataLog WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND location_id = 1;
DELETE FROM Analysis WHERE analysis_type = 'faulty' AND location_id = 5;
